Text:
Foolish of me to have downloaded this upscaled rip.
I have the dvd and it looks better then this faked AR rip. 
I love this movie and thought wow 720p BluRay, let's give it a try.
I'm very disappointed. 
This is probably the third fake 720p "bluray" rip I downloaded from BOZX.
When will people learn that faking the AR won't do any good but harm.
I'll think twice before download a 720p in the future.

...and I forgot to say my dvd has 448 KB/s English AC3. 
Stupid of me not reading the description saying this "720p bluray" has 384 KB/s AC3.
mkvonly if youve got better give us a link to it so we dont have to hunt through all your stuff, thanks to bozx for his efforts anyway
